Email_1.Subject: Keeping Our Citizens Safe
Email_1.Body:
Amazing work! You just saved many lives
    today! This is exactly why we need the DCPS,
    so we can stomp out psychotic freaks like that.
    People are safer because of you.
            
    You can do your next assignment when you are
    ready.

Email_2.Subject: Good Job Newbie
Email_2.Body: Impressive work, even for a new guy like you!
